INTRO: Is your lifestyle good or bad for the environment? After this short test, you will get tips tailored for you. They will help you save time and money and improve your quality of life. And our planet will thank you!

RESULT_COMMON: We should all halve our carbon footprint to curb climate change.

TIPS_INTRO: Based on your results, we recommend that you familiarise yourself with the tips below. They may help you reduce your carbon footprint and save money, too!
MY_CARBON_FOOTPRINT:
My carbon footprint is {{co2e}} kg CO2e. Why don’t you do the test, too, and find out whether you are a threat or an opportunity for nature!
